editionStmt.p: The initial version of this file was created from data kindly provided by the Ethiopic Manuscript Imaging Project directed by Steve Delamarter.

publicationStmt.publisher: Die Schriftkultur des christlichen Äthiopiens und Eritreas: Eine multimediale Forschungsumgebung / Beta maṣāḥǝft

licence.p: This file is licensed under the Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike 4.0.

msContents.summary: Images 3r-154l: Psalter. The midpoint is unmarked. Psalm 151 is the short version. The fourth biblical canticle has a superscription in which another hand has added the ት (mark of the feminine) on the end of the word for prophet, i.e., prophetess. Song of songs is the common version. Praises of Mary begins on Monday and culminates in Sunday. Varia: Image 1r: Scribal exercise, excerpt of Psalms. Image 2l-3l: pen trials. Image 154l contains a note of ownership: ዝመጽሐፍ ዘመምኅር ወልደ ዮሐንስ. Image 2r: Note of secondary ownership, ዝመጽሐፍ ዘትስብእተ ወልድ ጠቋሩ, "this book belongs to Tsbete Wald, black [man]." Image 154r: Medical prescription , in Amharic. Images 155l and r: scrawls. Image 156l: Scribal note about the scribe testing the pen, accompanied by a section from Gate of Light, written in purple ink. Image 157l: writing exercise with the Alphabet.
